Module imagingbook.plugins_book
Package Ch09_AutomaticThresholding

Class Adaptive_All

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ch09_AutomaticThresholding.Adaptive_All
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PlugInFilter
    public class Adaptive_All
extends Object
implements PlugInFilter

    ImageJ demo plugin making available a selection of adaptive thresholders. See Sec. 9.2 of [1] for additional details. This plugin works on 8-bit grayscale images only. The original image is modified to a binary image.

    [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, Digital Image Processing – An Algorithmic Introduction, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).

    Version:
    2022/04/01
    See Also:
    Adaptive_Bernsen, Adaptive_Interpolating, Adaptive_Niblack, Adaptive_Sauvola
